text: Tovuz is a raion of Azerbaijan. It is from Baku. A major train line runs through the center, stopping at Tovuz Stansiya. Tovuz also borders Armenia near the village of Eli Beli. The town of Tovuz is the capital of this raion. There are 113 settlements. == Notable residents== * Ganira Pashayeva, Member (MP) of the National Assembly of Azerbaijan for Tovuz Raion and journalist ==References== Category:Districts of Azerbaijan
title: Tovuz Rayon
